column4: I want to add a shell script but I'm padlocked out of my File System,   Can I gain access into it again or how long will this lock-out last?
eye, the little padlock icon in nautilus is on the file system
you don't have permissions to add files to the standard bin directories unless you sudo
you can either use sudo to put the file in /usr/local/bin   or you can put the file in /home/username/bin if it's something intended primaraly for your user.
